part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden sandals with a flat base secured with leather straps. Elevated on thick perpendicular slats to keep the feet raised above the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A deceptively cheap-looking plastic bracelet that hides a holographic secret.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrapped-front robe with long billowing sleeves. Not even its dark color can fully hide the dirt accumulated from countless days of travel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is the crumbled sheet of paper that your late spouse pressed into your hand before you recoiled away. You have regretted many times not reading it immediately.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A canvas canopy stretched across a collapsible metal frame mounted on a wooden handle. Cheaply made but any source of shade is invaluable in the desert.
